item.title: Yell not working right
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[font=Verdana]This should work.[/font] if (c.playerRights == 0) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535><col=21512><col=914>[Player]<shad=16711680><col=1230><col=00091>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=9999990><col=2151512><col=1230914>[Moderator]<shad=120931><col=2301><col=12113><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 2) { c2.sendMessage("<img=2><shad=9999990><col=1240971><col=123091414>[Administrator]<img=2><shad=12409><col=255><col=12412>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 3) { c2.sendMessage("<img=3><shad=08124087><col=2126151><col=4124615>[Main Owner]<img=3></col><shad=15007744><col=12308701>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 4) { c2.sendMessage("<img=4><shad=65820><col=11928><col=12341>[Donator]<img=4><shad=65820><col=1231><col=121141>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 5) { c2.sendMessage("<img=5><shad=65820><col=1697892><col=12125467>[Server Support]<img=5><shad=658234620><col=12334161><col=1234141>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 6) { c2.sendMessage("<img=6><shad=65820><col=1193458><col=123282>[Developer]<img=6><shad=009640><col=983621><col=98096>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }

[font=verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif]But what would be even better is using a switch statement:[/font]

switch(c.playerRights) { case 1: c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=9999990><col=2151512><col=1230914>[Moderator]<shad=120931><col=2301><col=12113><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); break; case 2: c2.sendMessage("<img=2><shad=9999990><col=1240971><col=123091414>[Administrator]<img=2><shad=12409><col=255><col=12412>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); break; case 3: c2.sendMessage("<img=3><shad=08124087><col=2126151><col=4124615>[Main Owner]<img=3></col><shad=15007744><col=12308701>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); break; case 4: c2.sendMessage("<img=4><shad=65820><col=11928><col=12341>[Donator]<img=4><shad=65820><col=1231><col=121141>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); break; case 5: c2.sendMessage("<img=5><shad=65820><col=1697892><col=12125467>[Server Support]<img=5><shad=658234620><col=12334161><col=1234141>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); break; case 6: c2.sendMessage("<img=6><shad=65820><col=1193458><col=123282>[Developer]<img=6><shad=009640><col=983621><col=98096>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); break; default: c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535><col=21512><col=914>[Player]<shad=16711680><col=1230><col=00091>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); break; }

Read full topic

item.title: Yell not working right
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“lol space, post:7, topic:544321”][quote author=final9999 link=topic=663201.msg4432436#msg4432436 date=1403853655]
Lol I just noticed he added else if instead of if(c.playerRights == 1).

That indeed is correct. But since his original code had 2 if statements. and I read else if, I assumed he putted it in front of a wrong line. Sorry for the incovenience!
[/quote]
Adding the } else if infront of that line gives me the “100 errors” lmao.[/quote]
Yeah you need to delete a bracket elsewhere. Use an IDE dude

item.title: Yell not working right

[quote=“lol space, post:3, topic:544321”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=663201.msg4432300#msg4432300 date=1403761274]
You’re missing a brace before the second if statement
[/quote]

} else if (c.playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=9999990><col=2151512><col=1230914>[Moderator]<shad=120931><col=2301><col=12113><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "Would that be better?[/quote]
Yes that would be better.

I don’t know why final said no. You were correct.

item.title: Yell not working right
item.dc:creator: @final9999 final9999
item.description:
@final9999 wrote:

[quote=“lol space, post:3, topic:544321”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=663201.msg4432300#msg4432300 date=1403761274]
You’re missing a brace before the second if statement
[/quote]

} else if (c.playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=9999990><col=2151512><col=1230914>[Moderator]<shad=120931><col=2301><col=12113><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "Would that be better?[/quote]

No it’s in the first part here:

if (c.playerRights == 0) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535><col=21512><col=914>[Player]<shad=16711680><col=1230><col=00091>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); //MISSING A CLOSING BRACKET HERE ('}') if (c.playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=9999990><col=2151512><col=1230914>[Moderator]<shad=120931><col=2301><col=12113><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

Regards,

Blaze

item.title: Yell not working right
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Okay, so if I’m a normal player and not any kind of staff or donator. I can yell perfectly fine. But If I give myself the player rights for staff, and donator it doesn’;t allow me to yell. But yet all the yells are identical with just the difference of player rights being the matter.

My yell command,

if (c.playerRights == 0) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535><col=21512><col=914>[Player]<shad=16711680><col=1230><col=00091>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); if (c.playerRights == 1) { c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=9999990><col=2151512><col=1230914>[Moderator]<shad=120931><col=2301><col=12113><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 2){ c2.sendMessage("<img=2><shad=9999990><col=1240971><col=123091414>[Administrator]<img=2><shad=12409><col=255><col=12412>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 3) { c2.sendMessage("<img=3><shad=08124087><col=2126151><col=4124615>[Main Owner]<img=3></col><shad=15007744><col=12308701>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 4) { c2.sendMessage("<img=4><shad=65820><col=11928><col=12341>[Donator]<img=4><shad=65820><col=1231><col=121141>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 5) { c2.sendMessage("<img=5><shad=65820><col=1697892><col=12125467>[Server Support]<img=5><shad=658234620><col=12334161><col=1234141>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else if (c.playerRights == 6) { c2.sendMessage("<img=6><shad=65820><col=1193458><col=123282>[Developer]<img=6><shad=009640><col=983621><col=98096>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
